title: [Site Update] Attachment in Comments
body:
Greetings summoners!

You can now attach a (single) file to any comment you make on the PBE forums. This should be helpful for attaching screenshots and logs when reporting issues! We have the same restrictions on file types as attachments on discussions, we support the following file types: **.JPG, .PNG, .ROFL, .TXT, .R3D, .LOG**

Please let us know if you run into any issues!
